business_strategies.implementation: Build defensible content based on unique personality rather than format innovation

steps: Adapt content for longer viewing sessions

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Focusing on content format as defensible strategy
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on personality and perspective instead

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not preparing for platform shifts years in advance
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing opportunities when mainstream adoption hits
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Start preparing for emerging technologies before mainstream adoption
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Easier to launch app in 2009 when App Store launched than in 2019
